title: GOOD OMENS Official Trailer (2019) David Tennant, Michael Sheen Series HD
author: Rapid Trailer
comment: Ever since Dr. Who,anything with David Tennant is automatically on my "have to see" list.
You think I got interested in this because of David tennant and his phenomenal acting? You’re absolutely right I did.
This probably the closest thing I’m every going to get to having Doctor Who show up in Supernatural, isn’t it?
Tennant in ginger. I REPEAT THE DOCTOR IS GINGER !

I still fondly remember meeting Pratchett and Gaiman in London during a book signing of this and Pratchett's Reaper Man. Gaiman was clad, as usual, in leather jacket and shades and seemed a little less talkative than Pratchett who was absolutely everything and more I'd hoped one of my lifelong idols would be. He took the time to ask where I'd travelled from, my name, favourite Discworld character and didn't simply move on to the next person in the queue when I blurted out a somewhat incomprehensible stream of gibberish waffle as everything I'd planned to ask him vacated my mind in a moment of panic and left me acting more like a confused orangutan than the verbose, eloquent and intellectual young whipper snapper I'd hoped to present him with. Suffice to say I feel blessed that I got to meet the literary legend during mine and his lifetime and it's a memory I'll always cherish.
description:
